item.title: 杜特尔特盟友希望成为马科斯-金支持的建筑商的赌场合作伙伴
item.description: 菲律宾大亨丹尼斯-乌伊（Dennis Uy）正寻求与一家建筑公司合作，该公司由一家与小费迪南德-马科斯总统堂兄家族有关联的公司支持，以完成这位商人停滞不前的赌场项目。【原文：Philippine tycoon Dennis Uy is looking to partner with a construction company backed by a firm linked to the family of President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.’s cousin to finish the businessman’s stalled casino project.】

item.title: 新西兰将为国有新西兰银行注资
item.description: 新西兰政府将为国有 Kiwibank 注资多达 5 亿新西兰元（约合 2.9 亿美元），以改善由四家澳大利亚贷方主导的银行业的竞争状况。【原文：New Zealand’s government will pursue a capital injection of as much as NZ$500 million ($290 million) for state-owned Kiwibank as it seeks to improve competition in a banking sector dominated by four Australian-owned lenders.】

item.title: 自特朗普赢得大选以来，美国比特币 ETF 流入量接近 100 亿美元
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普当选总统以来，已有近 100 亿美元涌入直接投资比特币的美国交易所交易基金，赌他对加密货币行业的支持预示着市场的繁荣。【原文：Almost $10 billion has poured into US exchange-traded funds investing directly in Bitcoin since Donald Trump became president-elect, in a bet that his embrace of the crypto sector heralds a boom for the market.】

item.title: 中国企业债券收益率创历史最长连跌纪录
item.description: 在政府官员准备开会讨论来年可能采取的刺激措施之际，中国部分企业债券收益率创下有史以来最长连跌纪录。【原文：Some Chinese corporate bond yields are on their longest declining streak ever, as government officials prepare to meet to discuss possible stimulus measures for the coming year.】

item.title: 看跌押注增加，陷入困境的澳元面临进一步下跌的风险
item.description: 对冲基金增加了对澳元的空头押注，因为疲软的经济增长数据提升了政策放松的预期，而即将上任的美国政府也在推进关税征收。【原文：Hedge funds have increased short bets against Australia’s dollar as soft growth data lift expectations of policy easing and the incoming US administration progresses with its tariff levies.】

item.title: 警方称澳大利亚犹太教堂火灾 "很可能 "是恐怖袭击
item.description: 澳大利亚执法机构已将发生在南部城市墨尔本一座犹太教堂的明显纵火袭击升级为 "可能的 "恐怖事件，从而使对这起促使以色列总理直接斥责堪培拉政府的事件的调查升级。【原文：Australian law enforcement agencies have upgraded an apparent arson attack at a synagogue in the southern city of Melbourne to a “likely” terrorist incident, escalating the investigation of an event that prompted Israel’s prime minister to directly rebuke the government in Canberra.】

item.title: 印度首次公开募股热潮有望延续至 2025 年，大宗交易排起长队
item.description: 印度首次公开募股市场蓬勃发展，投资者对股票销售的热情不断高涨，鼓励公司利用资金，2025 年印度首次公开募股市场有望再创佳绩。【原文：India’s booming market for initial public offerings looks primed for another strong showing in 2025 as surging investor appetite for share sales encourages companies to tap funding.】

item.title: 马云在打击蚂蚁金服以来的罕见演讲中推动人工智能发展
item.description: 中国亿万富翁马云在蚂蚁金服集团股份有限公司 20 周年庆典上发表演讲时振臂一呼，在政府打压迫使这家金融科技巨头取消四年前全球最大的首次公开募股之后，马云罕见地露面。【原文：Chinese billionaire Jack Ma rallied his troops during a speech at Ant Group Co.’s 20th anniversary, making a rare appearance after a government crackdown forced the fintech giant to scrap what would have been the world’s largest initial public offering four years ago.】

item.title: 微型企业的新高峰意味着散户投资者的风险偏好保持不变
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 菲律宾利用退税刺激游客购物
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）周一颁布法律，向非居民游客退还增值税，旨在刺激游客购物和消费。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Monday enacted a law granting value-added tax refund to non-resident tourists, aiming to spur visitors to shop and spend more.】

item.title: 药明康德公司因美国通过生物安全法案的机会减少而大涨
item.description: 在针对中国生物技术服务公司的美国立法草案被排除在一项重要的国防法案之外后，药明康德公司和药明生物开曼公司的股价周一大涨。【原文：Shares of WuXi AppTec Co. and WuXi Biologics Cayman Inc. surged Monday, after a draft US legislation targeting the Chinese biotechnology service firms was left out of a key defense bill.】

item.title: 新喀里多尼亚镍矿重启后前景 "岌岌可危
item.description: 新喀里多尼亚镍矿商 Prony Resources New Caledonia SAS 警告说，该公司位于法国领土的戈罗矿最近因骚乱而暂停开采，即使公司重新开始运营，经济上也很脆弱。【原文：Nickel miner Prony Resources New Caledonia SAS warned that its Goro mine in the French territory is economically vulnerable after a recent suspension due to unrest, even as the company restarts operations.】

item.title: 刺激经济后，中国消费通胀仍在放缓
item.description: 中国 11 月份的消费通胀率有所下降，这表明政府支持经济和情绪的努力还不足以扭转需求疲软的局面。【原文：China’s consumer inflation decelerated in November, in a sign government efforts to support the economy and sentiment haven’t been enough to turn around the weak demand.】

item.title: 腾讯与 Nexon 将在中国发行《第一狂战士》游戏
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司将与东京上市公司 Nexon Co：该东京上市公司在一份声明中表示，将与 Nexon Co.【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. will develop and publish a localized version of The First Berserker: Khazan in China in partnership with Nexon Co., the Tokyo-listed company says in a statement.】

item.title: 随着创纪录的债券供应进入市场，韩国收益率曲线或将趋缓
item.description: 韩国的收益率曲线可能会陡峭化，因为大量新债将与央行 2025 年上半年的宽松政策预期背道而驰。【原文：South Korea’s yield curve may steepen, as a deluge of new debt runs up against expected policy easing by the central bank in the first half of 2025.】

item.title: 斯塔默计划改革英国国家机构以回应批评
item.description: 首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的政府将启动一项 1 亿英镑（约合 1.27 亿美元）的基金，旨在帮助国家 "更像一个初创企业 "一样运行，工党正试图回击对其执政头几个月动荡局势的批评。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s government is set to launch a £100 million ($127 million) fund aimed at helping the state run “more like a start up,” as Labour attempts to rebut criticism over its tumultuous first few months in power.】

item.title: 招聘人员称英国职位空缺创四年来最大降幅
item.description: 11 月份，英国公司的职位招聘缩减幅度为四年多来最大，这是对工党首份预算案中增税措施的直接宣判。【原文：UK firms scaled back job postings by the most in over four years in November, delivering an immediate verdict on the tax hikes in Labour’s first budget.】

item.title: Growtheum 向菲律宾冷藏链投资 1.21 亿美元
item.description: Growtheum Capital Partners 将向菲律宾冷藏供应商 Mets Logistics Inc. 投资 70 亿比索（1.21 亿美元），支持这个被东南亚国家视为保障食品供应关键的行业。【原文：Growtheum Capital Partners will invest 7 billion pesos ($121 million) in Philippine cold storage provider Mets Logistics Inc., backing an industry that the Southeast Asian nation sees as crucial in securing food supply.】

item.title: 日本央行考虑加息时机，日本经济增长被上调
item.description: 日本经济的增长速度超过了最初的估计，这表明在央行本月晚些时候做出政策决定前对数据进行分析时，日本经济复苏的势头更加强劲。【原文：Japan’s economy grew at a faster pace than initially estimated, indicating more strength in the recovery as the central bank parses data ahead of a policy decision later this month.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的 Kioxia 将于周一确定在东京首次公开募股的最终价格
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）支持的 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 将于周一为其首次公开募股定价，这家日本内存制造商的估值可能高达 55 亿美元。【原文：Bain Capital-backed Kioxia Holdings Corp. is set to price its initial public offering Monday that could value the Japanese memory maker at as much as $5.5 billion.】

item.title: 中国央行暂停买入黄金后恢复买入，黄金上涨
item.description: 在中国央行 11 月份将金银纳入储备之后，黄金上涨；结束了长达六个月的购买热潮，而这一热潮曾为贵金属提供了关键的支撑。【原文：Gold rose after China’s central bank added bullion to its reserves in November — ending a six-month pause to a purchasing spree that had provided a key pillar of support for the precious metal.】

item.title: 沙特降价预示疲软前景，石油维持周跌势
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯对亚洲原油价格的下调幅度超过预期后，石油连续第二周下跌。【原文：Oil held a second weekly decline after Saudi Arabia reduced its crude prices for Asia by more than expected, while the market watches for any fallout following the toppling of the Syrian regime.】

item.title: 亚洲市场在地缘政治紧张局势中保持谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周一开盘涨跌不一，交易员们正努力应对韩国持续的政治动荡，投资者则在等待中国政府出台新刺激政策的迹象。叙利亚政府被推翻后，石油将受到密切关注。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a mixed opening on Monday as traders grappled with continued political upheaval in South Korea and as investors awaited signs of fresh stimulus from Beijing. Oil will be closely watched after the Syrian government was toppled.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷打击后，澳大利亚着手废除 AT1 债券
item.description: 尽管存在一些担忧，澳大利亚银行业监管机构仍在推进取消或有可转换证券市场的工作，成为第一个逐步取消这种证券的国家。【原文：Australia’s banking regulator is pushing ahead to scrap the market for contingent convertible securities, despite some concerns, becoming the first country to phase out the securities that were wiped out after the collapse of Credit Suisse last year.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 欧佩克+"将恢复供应的时间推迟到四月的举措令期权交易商的情绪成为几个月来最低迷的。美国农业部周二公布了最新的供需预估，大豆成为焦点。而美国天然气 "鳏夫 "交易已经翻转，预示着对冬季结束时市场供应过剩的提前押注。【原文：The move by OPEC+ to delay the revival of supply to April is making options traders the most downbeat in months. Soybeans are in the spotlight with the US Department of Agriculture releasing its latest supply-and-demand estimates Tuesday. And the US natural gas “widowmaker” trade has flipped, signaling early bets of an oversupplied market at the end of winter.】

item.title: 结束阿萨德统治的叙利亚叛军乔拉尼是谁？
item.description: 阿萨德家族在叙利亚统治了半个多世纪，近年来只统治了该国的一部分地区。在巴沙尔-阿萨德（Bashar al-Assad）总统的权力首次受到起义挑战的十多年后，叛军出人意料地推翻了他的统治。他已逃往俄罗斯。【原文：The Assad family has ruled in Syria for more than half a century — in recent years over just part of the country. A surprise push by rebels has toppled it more than a decade after an uprising first challenged President Bashar al-Assad’s grip on power. He’s fled the country for Russia.】

item.title: 前汇丰银行行长努诺-马托斯将接替埃利奥特出任澳新银行首席执行官
item.description: 努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）将成为澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）的首席执行官，接替夏恩-埃利奥特（Shayne Elliott）。【原文：Nuno Matos will become chief executive officer at ANZ Group Holdings Ltd., succeeding Shayne Elliott who is retiring after nine years in the role that culminated in a tumultuous ending.】

item.title: 澳新银行首席执行官谢恩-艾略特（Shayne Elliott）辞职，《非洲金融报》报道
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》报道，澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.据《澳大利亚金融评论报》报道，首席执行官谢恩-艾略特（Shayne Elliott）将在任职九年后辞职。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Shayne Elliott will resign after nine years in the job, the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: Arthur J Gallagher 即将达成 120 亿美元收购 AssuredPartners 的交易
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，Arthur J. Gallagher & Co.正在就收购 AssuredPartners 进行深入谈判，该交易对这家保险经纪公司的估值约为 120 亿美元。【原文：Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. is in advanced talks to acquire AssuredPartners in a deal valuing the insurance broker at about $12 billion, a person with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 债券交易员认为通胀数据是下一次降息的关键
item.description: 债券交易员们希望在动荡的一年结束时能够平稳度过；除非通胀率出人意料地飙升，让他们再次陷入困境。【原文：Bond traders are hoping to coast to the end of a volatile year — unless a surprise jump in inflation throws them another curve.】
